text: The Australian Production Design Guild was formed in 1988 to represent people working in production design and VFX in film, television, multimedia and other related audio industries. The guild is headquartered in Sydney. ==Awards== The guild recognises people working in the Australian production design industry. Members of the guild nominate work they completed in the previous year, the nominations are judged by the members en masse. The guild offers awards for best production design, best visual effect and a members' choice award.
